short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All the HubSpot tools you need. Right in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The HubSpot Toolbox provides a comprehensive suite of utilities directly in your browser, designed to enhance your productivity and streamline your marketing and sales tasks.

It offers a suite of built-in utilities, including a UTM generator, dark mode, color picker, and a resource library with over 60 tools. Whether you're tracking campaigns, designing, or accessing essential resources, this extension is a must-have for HubSpot users.

Essential features for every HubSpot user:

üõ†Ô∏è UTM Generator: Easily create and manage UTM codes for your campaigns.
üé® Color Picker: Quickly select and copy HEX colors for your designs.
üåô Dark Mode: Reduce eye strain with a sleek dark mode across HubSpot pages.
üìù Note Taking: Capture important notes and reminders within the extension.
üìö Resource Library: Access a curated collection of 60+ tools to optimize your workflow.

--------------
Version 1.3 includes:
- Fully updated Color Picker with improved functionality.
- Visual enhancements for better consistency.
- Minor UI improvements to refine layout and improve user experience.
- Small bug fixes to improve overall performance and stability.

Previous versions:
- Version 1.2: Major UI overhaul with new colors, buttons, and icons. Additional resources added for AI and automation. Added search bar for easier navigation of the toolset. Improved organization of tools into categories for a cleaner interface.
- Version 1.1: Added Color Picker, fixed Dark Mode functionality, small bug fixes.
- Version 1.0: Initial release with UTM Generator, Dark Mode, and Quick Note Taking features.
